DOC.brief_summary: Treating an AMI patient with ST elevation with Aggrastat in the ambulance on his or her way to the hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Treating Acute MI Patients With Aggrastat on Their Way to Hospital
DOC.criteria: patients with acute Myocardial infarction with ST elevation , and moving by ambulance to Poriya hospital women less than 50 years old and 80 years old, bleeding tendency, stroke in the past
